pullRequest.title: Add evidence to custom HTML reports
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is my first contribution.
I added the checkbox and field as hinted in the issue report zaproxy/zaproxy#6151
However I wasn't able to test my solution as I'm not sure how to install a locally built addOn. Also I couldn't find any tests to update. So any help testing this would be much appreciated!
Fix zaproxy/zaproxy#6151.

+- Add Evidence to report (Issue 6151)

nodes.bodyText: customreport.alertdetails.evidence = Evidence will need be to added to the add-on's Messages.properties file. (Line 34 I believe)
